title: Poster, "Human Rights Now, Amnesty International", 1988
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed: Imprinted in green, lower margin: Printing: Kenner Printing Co. Inc. Paper: Mohawk 80 lb. Poseidon Text, Vellum Finish Color Separation: International Productions
creditline: Gift of Steven Heller and Karrie Jacobs
description: Poster depicts four blue hands holding different light sources—a match, a lighter, a candle, and a flashlight—on a black background. Text above in green: HUMAN RIGHTS NOW; / left: ONE MOVEMENT / ONE MESSAGE / MANY VOICES; right: AMNESTY / INTERNATIONAL / 1988.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Human Rights Now, Amnesty International", 1988.
1988. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Steven Heller and Karrie Jacobs. 1993-53-55.
